TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_tay_Kaka_Mkiyap, title = Kaka_Mkiyap, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Atayal]}, url = {https://tay.wikipedia.org/wiki/Kaka_Mkiyap} }

S.FORM: miru: Toyu Watan === maki qutux ryax aring sasan tminun bluku qu yutas Watan. musa magal rinnosan nya, cyux nya 'bgan qsya, ru blequn nya mkuw babaw qlcing, t'aring tminun qu yutas Watan. cingay hazi cinninun nya lga, nyutun nya masing pr'ru tnunan nya, nanu m'ru balay qu cinnun nya. ===

miro: Toyo Watan === maki qotox ryax aring sasan tminon bloko qo yotas Watan. mosa magal rinnosan nya, cyox nya 'bgan qsya, ro bleqon nya mkow babaw qlcing, t'aring tminon qo yotas Watan. cingay hazi cinninon nya lga, nyoton nya masing pr'ro tnonan nya, nano m'ro balay qo cinnon nya. ===
